A Song of degrees for Solomon. Except the LORD build the house, they labour in vain that build it: except the LORD keep the city, the watchman waketh <FI>but<Fi> in vain.<RF>for…: or, of Solomon<Rf><RF>that…: Heb. that are builders of it in it<Rf>
<FI>It is<Fi> vain for you to rise up early, to sit up late, to eat the bread of sorrows: <FI>for<Fi> so he giveth his beloved sleep.
Lo, children <FI>are<Fi> an heritage of the LORD: <FI>and<Fi> the fruit of the womb <FI>is his<Fi> reward.
As arrows <FI>are<Fi> in the hand of a mighty man; so <FI>are<Fi> children of the youth.

Happy <FI>is<Fi> the man that hath his quiver full of them: they shall not be ashamed, but they shall speak with the enemies in the gate.<RF>his…: Heb. filled his quiver with them<Rf><RF>speak…: or, subdue, or, destroy<Rf><CM>
